main event: A saucer-shaped, dull and silver gray object was observed drifting across the sky, emitting a sound like a small motor and jets of vapor.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-5 seconds.
The object was saucer-shaped and made a sound like a small motor.
The object emitted jets of vapor that appeared to be streaming straight up into the clouds.
The witness has not provided enough information to determine a probable cause.
The size, speed, and altitude estimates of the object appear questionable.
sighted object: saucer-shaped, dull and silver gray object
